question: What is your return policy?
answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all unused items in their original packaging. Returns are free for defective products, while customer-initiated returns may incur a restocking fee of 10%. To initiate a return, please contact our support team with your order number.

question: How long does shipping take?
answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days within the continental US. Expedited shipping options are available at checkout for 1-2 day delivery. International shipping typically takes 7-14 business days depending on the destination.

question: Do you offer product warranties?
answer: Yes, all our products come with a manufacturer's warranty ranging from 1-3 years depending on the product category. Electronic items typically have a 1-year warranty, while appliances and furniture may have up to 3 years of coverage. Extended warranty options are available for purchase.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and select buy-now-pay-later services including Afterpay and Klarna. All transactions are secured with 256-bit SSL encryption.

question: How do I create an account?
answer: To create an account, click on the 'Sign In' button at the top right of our homepage and select 'Create Account'. You'll need to provide your name, email address, and create a password. Once registered, you can track orders, save items to your wishlist, and enjoy faster checkout.

question: How can I track my order?
answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can enter this tracking number on our website's 'Track Order' page or directly on the carrier's website. You can also check your order status by logging into your account and viewing your order history.

question: Are your products authentic?
answer: Yes, we guarantee that all products sold on our website are 100% authentic. We source directly from manufacturers and authorized distributors. Each product comes with original packaging, documentation, and full manufacturer warranty.

question: Do you ship internationally?
answer: Yes, we ship to over 100 countries worldwide. International shipping rates are calculated at checkout based on destination and package weight. Please note that international customers may be responsible for customs duties and taxes imposed by their country.

question: How do I know if an item is in stock?
answer: Product availability is displayed on each product page. Items marked 'In Stock' are ready to ship. 'Low Stock' indicates limited availability, and 'Out of Stock' means the item is currently unavailable but may be restocked soon. You can sign up for stock notifications on out-of-stock items.

question: Do you offer student discounts?
answer: Yes, we offer a 10% discount for students with valid .edu email addresses. To claim your discount, sign up using your school email and verify your student status. The discount applies to all regular-priced items and cannot be combined with other promotions.

question: Do you sell gift cards?
answer: Yes, we offer both physical and digital gift cards in denominations from $25 to $500. Physical gift cards are shipped within 1 business day, while digital gift cards are delivered via email within minutes of purchase. Gift cards never expire and can be used for any product on our website.

question: How do you protect my personal information?
answer: We take data security seriously and use industry-standard encryption and security protocols to protect your personal information. We never store credit card information on our servers and comply with PCI DSS standards. Your data is never shared with third parties without your explicit consent.

question: How do I find the right size?
answer: Each product page includes a detailed sizing chart with measurements in both inches and centimeters. We recommend measuring yourself and comparing with our charts before ordering. If you're between sizes, we generally recommend sizing up for comfort. Free size exchanges are available within 30 days of purchase.

question: How can I contact customer support?
answer: Our customer support team is available 24/7 through multiple channels. You can reach us via live chat on our website, by emailing support@storefront.com, or by calling 1-800-STORE-01. Average response time is under 5 minutes for chat and 24 hours for email inquiries.

question: Can I cancel my order?
answer: Orders can be cancelled within 1 hour of placement by contacting our support team. Once an order has entered the processing phase, it cannot be cancelled but can be returned once received using our standard return policy. Expedited orders enter processing more quickly and have shorter cancellation windows.

question: Do you offer discounts for bulk orders?
answer: Yes, we offer volume discounts for orders of 10 or more identical items. Discounts start at 5% for 10+ items and increase to 15% for 50+ items. For bulk orders, please contact our business sales team at business@storefront.com with your requirements for a custom quote.

question: How should I care for my products?
answer: Product care instructions vary by item and are included with each product. General guidelines include wiping electronics with a dry, soft cloth; machine washing clothing on gentle cycles with similar colors; and using appropriate cleaning products for furniture. Specific care instructions are available on each product page.

question: Do you price match competitors?
answer: Yes, we offer price matching on identical items sold by authorized retailers. To request a price match, contact our support team with a link to the competitor's product page. The item must be in stock and available for immediate delivery. Price matching cannot be combined with other discounts or promotions.

question: What happens if an item is on backorder?
answer: If an item is on backorder, you'll see an estimated shipping date on the product page. You can still place your order, and your card will not be charged until the item ships. You'll receive email updates on the status of your backordered item, and you can cancel at any time before it ships.

question: Do you have a loyalty program?
answer: Yes, our Storefront Rewards program lets you earn points on every purchase. For every dollar spent, you earn 10 points. Points can be redeemed for discounts on future purchases. Members also receive exclusive offers, early access to sales, and birthday rewards. Membership is free and automatically created with your first purchase.
